name: test-runway
description: Test site to use and debug the runway-gallery, runway-react, and runway-webpack-loader packages -- devDependencies of deepmerge, file-loader, and sharp are temporary due to known NPM issue of resolving local module dependencies. TODO: change file: dependencies to regular dependencies.

scripts.dev: npm link react-element-placeholder && npm link runway-react && npm link runway-webpack-loader && webpack-dev-server --watch --config webpack.config.js --content-base build/public/
scripts.build: npm link react-element-placeholder && npm link runway-react && npm link runway-webpack-loader && webpack -p --config webpack.config.js --output-path build/public/

author: Eric Weber
